Welcome to the **yrS3** documentation. This book gathers the project’s specs, setup instructions, and reference material in one place.

**How to use this book**

- Start with [How to navigate documentation](DOC-GUIDE-v001.html) to understand document types and version numbering.
- For the MVP scope and technical spec, see [SPEC — Initial MVP](SPEC-0.0.1.html).
- For setup and deployment, see [Setup & Run](SETUP-0.0.1-v001.html).
- To rebuild this HTML book after editing the docs, see [Quarto doc guide](QUARTO-DOC-GUIDE.html).

All source files live in the `docs/` folder. The rendered HTML is in `docs/_book/`.
